masterBackendRole.description: This backend role from the SAML IdP receives full permissions to the cluster, equivalent to a new master user.

masterUserName.description: This username from the SAML IdP receives full permissions to the cluster, equivalent to a new master user.

rolesKey.description: Element of the SAML assertion to use for backend roles. Default is roles.

sessionTimeoutMinutes.description: Duration of a session in minutes after a user logs in. Default is 60. Maximum value is 1,440.

subjectKey.description: Element of the SAML assertion to use for username. Default is NameID.
